_header: O sovereign lord be it to your plesaunce
_description: Dedicatory verses addressed to Henry VI or Edward IV in one copy of John Hardyng’s Metrical Chronicle—four stanzas rhyme royal.

BLLan204.First Lines: O souerayne lord be it to ȝoure plesanceThis book to  take of my symplicite…
BLLan204.Last Lines: …Thaym conquerde hool to hys subiecciounTo byde for euere vndir hys hool proteccioun
BLLan204.Note: Added to front flyleaf by a hand other than that of the Chronicle.
